alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Green Lake; Marquette; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 1:19PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Green Lake, northern Columbia, south central Marquette and northeastern Sauk Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Pardeeville to near West Baraboo. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baraboo, Portage, Lake Wisconsin, Pardeeville, Markesan, West Baraboo, Manchester, Wyocena, North Freedom, Rock Springs, Kingston, Dalton, Interstate 90/94 Interchange, and Devils Lake St Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 96 and 108. Interstate 39 between mile markers 85 and 95. Interstate 39/90/94 between mile markers 109 and 110. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 215 and 223. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
